name: injection
content:
injection noun [C or U]
(DRUG)
Add to word list
Add to word list
C2 the act of putting a liquid, especially a drug, into a person's body using a needle and a syringe (= small tube): Daily insulin injections are necessary for some diabetics.by injection This steroid is sometimes given by injection.
Inside Creative House/iStock/Getty Images Plus/GettyImages
More examplesFewer examplesMy arm was very tender after the injection.If I'm talking a bit funnily it's because I've just had an injection in my mouth.Most patients find that the numbness from the injection wears off after about an hour.We took our cat to the vet's for its annual cat flu injection.The injection provides some temporary relief from the pain.
